ygData.subject: soerbairds
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it just me or is Soerbairds guild a rip off....I really want to know why the heck it costs 10plat plus a monthly fee to join...thats a load of Bull
ygData.messageBody:
Is it just me or is Soerbairds guild a rip off....I really want to know
why the heck it costs 10plat plus a monthly fee to join...thats a load
of Bull crap.....I was going to join but then i found i had better
things to do than pay to those greedy rogues....If you give me enough
information on that guild and why it costs so much then i might join it
until then.....keep begging Soerbairds.


This is Ralborn Songbearer ending his song

Ralborn
Bard of Qeynos
follower of Bristlebane
(also in his world)
